channel.title: Client Ideas
channel.description:
Anyone got any cool ideas for the client? Such as:
In-built IRC (like STS) Chat logging for each month, for each character (like MSN Plus) In-built voice chat RSC TV (xEnt's idea to view each others client/screen so people can stream what they're doing)
I wanna do something but I'm struggling for ideas. :(
I was thinking about making a automatic voter (almost like a virus I guess), when you load the client it loads up the RuneScape Top 100 voting page and then sends the captcha to someone to type (like SleepWalker) or even force them to type the captcha prior to logging in once a day. It would rack votes up quickly as fuck. For now I've just got it setup so when they type ::VOTE it launches the browser with the page and as soon as they vote they get a free 30 minutes subscription. It's cool 'n all but it's still quite a manual process and most players are lazy as hell.
Anyone got any ideas for doing something a bit different with the client?

item.title: Client Ideas
item.dc:creator: @pljay03 pljay03
item.description:
@pljay03 wrote:

[quote=“dimebagx, post:18, topic:357573”][quote author=pljay03 link=topic=454090.msg3327154#msg3327154 date=1283198313]
I’ve got a badass idea.
Create a huge menu box and inside, you can view the forums.
[/quote]

lol[/quote]
The in-game crap is probably stored in the same DB as the forum crap, so… I’m thinking it’s a good idea. I don’t know if you’d be able to make posts/topics but I know you can at least make the forum viewable.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Ideas

item.description:

I was thinking about making a automatic voter (almost like a virus I guess), when you load the client it loads up the RuneScape Top 100 voting page and then sends the captcha to someone to type (like SleepWalker) or even force them to type the captcha prior to logging in once a day. It would rack votes up quickly as fuck. For now I’ve just got it setup so when they type ::VOTE it launches the browser with the page and as soon as they vote they get a free 30 minutes subscription. It’s cool 'n all but it’s still quite a manual process and most players are lazy as hell.
[/quote]
Lol at you. Grow a pair and get some integrity you spineless prick. Forcing people to do something is never a good idea.[/quote]

rep++

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Yeah Luke, voting should be optional. The idea is to vote if you like the server, what if people were testing it out or something along those lines? It seems to be a dumb idea to force people to do it.

item.title: Client Ideas
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote author=vortex link=topic=454090.msg3325589#msg3325589 date=1283079044]That’s just gay

Why is it gay? It would be a community effort to dominate top lists and in turn generate a lot more traffic meaning more players.[/quote]Why is it gay to force users to vote for your server? Hurrrr
The sleepwalker-like idea is good though

[quote=“object, post:13, topic:357573”]The idea RSC-TV has existed much longer than that. I posted about it somewhere in this community back in 2006. But I never even started with it. I was inspired by HL-TV, the spectator mode of Quake III Arena and some old RSC bot that had a similar feature (only client-side though).[/quote]SBot had “ghosting” where you could spectate another player as long as they were in the same area as you

Read full topic

item.title: Client Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

The idea RSC-TV has existed much longer than that. I posted about it somewhere in this community back in 2006. But I never even started with it. I was inspired by HL-TV, the spectator mode of Quake III Arena and some old RSC bot that had a similar feature (only client-side though).

Read full topic
